channel.title: Con and shops help plz help im desperate!
channel.description:
Does anyone out there have a code I can use for con? (also would i have to delete my summoning?)
And how would i add shops that sell silab items?

item.title: Con and shops help plz help im desperate!
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

hm i might just make a tut on how to do this lmao helped so many people on this…

ok open shops.txt and add a shop

example

shop = 75	Aaron's Archery Appendages  			2	2	1129	10	1131	10	1133	10	1095	10	1097	10	1167	10	1169	10	1063	10
shop = 76	Dargaud's Bow and Arrows  			2	2	52	600	39	500	40	400	41	300	42	250	43	200	44	150	882	500	884	500	886	500	888	500	890	500	892	500	4773	0	4778	0	4783	0	4788	0	4793	0	4798	0	4803	0	841	20	843	20	849	20	839	20	845	20	4827	0	847	20
shop = 77	Authentic Throwing Weapons  			2	2	825	900	826	800	827	700	828	600	829	500	830	400	800	900	801	800	802	700	803	600	804	500	805	400
shop = 78	@whi@log supply shop				2	2	1511	2000	1521	2000	1519	2000	1517	2000	1515	2000	1513	2000	946	2000	590	2000

a new shop would be like

shop = 79	shop title				2	2	item id	ammount shop will sell

once you get that done go into client.java
find your shops

WanneShop = 30;

to add a shop

 else if (NPCID == npc id here) { // description
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = xx;  //shop id here
 }

that should be it need more help just ask

Read full topic

item.title: Con and shops help plz help im desperate!
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

add a shop then in shops.txt put ‘‘new runescape’’ ids that you want it to sell

thers no such thing as silab items runescape made them so they are ‘‘runescape items’’
